comments.text:
If you quit normally (session 1), then start up and browse around (session 2), then crash, when you start up next, session 1 will be available to restore (via restore previous session).

So what I'm thinking is that if resume_from_crash is false, we should delete sessionstore.js at startup to avoid this confusion.
comments.creator: paul@oshannessy.com
